CustomField.formula: Client_Name__c +" " + TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Scheduled__c)))+"/" + TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Scheduled__c)))+"/" + TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Scheduled__c))) + " " + TEXT(-7 + HOUR(TIMEVALUE(Scheduled__c)))+":" + LPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(TIMEVALUE(Scheduled__c))), 2, '0' )
CustomField.label: Display Name
